issue.title: std::expected<void, E>::value() also needs E to be copy constructible

discussion.p: LWG added Mandates: to std::expected::value, but the similar handling is missing for expected<cv void, E>.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after seven votes in favour during reflector poll.
discussion.note: 2023-06-17 Approved in Varna. Status changed: Voting → WP.

blockquote.p:
-?- Mandates: is_copy_constructible_v<E> is true.
-3- Throws: bad_expected_access(error()) if has_value() is false.

-?- Mandates: is_copy_constructible_v<E> is true and is_move_constructible_v<E> is true.
-4- Throws: bad_expected_access(std::move(error())) if has_value() is false.
